video_prompt: Metallic form subtly shifts and flows, mimicking melting as tendrils extend. Head slowly tilts upwards, eyes conveying contemplation. Tiny glowing particles drift and swirl around the figure. Background dynamically transitions from vibrant red to ominous black with evolving splatters and smoky textures.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Metallic humanoid figure with flowing, melting silver skin against a dramatic, split background of vibrant red and deep black ink splatters. Head tilted upwards, with ethereal blue/white particles surrounding. Artistic, elegant, AI-generated.
refined_video_prompt: A metallic form subtly shifts and flows, extending tendrils as it mimics melting. The head slowly tilts upwards, eyes conveying contemplation. Glowing particles continuously drift and swirl around. The background dynamically transitions from vibrant red to ominous black, with evolving splatters and smoky textures.
